name: AVAssetReader
desc: An object that reads media data from an asset.

items.name: init(asset: AVAsset)
items.desc: Creates an object to read media data from an asset.

items.name: func canAdd(AVAssetReaderOutput) -> Bool
items.desc: Determines whether you can add the output to the asset reader.

items.name: func add(AVAssetReaderOutput)
items.desc: Adds an output to the reader.

items.name: var outputs: [AVAssetReaderOutput]
items.desc: The outputs from which you read media data.

items.name: var timeRange: CMTimeRange
items.desc: The time range within the asset to read.

items.name: var status: AVAssetReader.Status
items.desc: The status of reading sample buffers from the asset.

items.name: enum AVAssetReader.Status
items.desc: Values that represent the possible states of an asset reader.

items.name: var error: Error?
items.desc: An error that describes the reason for a failure.

items.name: func startReading() -> Bool
items.desc: Prepares the asset reader to start reading sample buffers from the asset.

items.name: func cancelReading()
items.desc: Cancels any background work and stops the readerâ€™s outputs from reading more samples.

items.name: var asset: AVAsset
items.desc: The asset from which to read media data.
